text: @DrDenaGrayson @realDonaldTrump Coronavirus Response Coordinator, Dr Birx, was appointed Feb 27.  Experts said, had the US launched social distancing 2 wks earlier Mar 2 instead of Mar 16, 90% of COVID-19 deaths in US could have been averted.  Birx lied when saying we didn't know how contagious it was till Mar.
